replies.body: Nice video.  But was it just me or does anyone else get a black screen with a little music for 8 minuets?
replies.body_tagged: Nice video.  But was it just me or does anyone else get a black screen with a little music for 8 minuets?

replies.body: Yeh lol i think it bugged..

replies.body: Everything is awesome! The only thing that I suggest you is using resource packs :p (Azurine UHC/Deep Sky etc.)
